Info.description:
2D MATLAB glider simulator (state [vx, vy, x, h]), uses L = (1/2)*ρ*(v^2)*A*CL, D = (1/2)*ρ*(v^2)*A*CD.
Uses ode45 + event to stop at h = 0. Sweeps multiple airfoils and reports range/time
Figures saved to plots/ , CSV summary to results/
Assumes constant angle of attack, sea-level ρ, no wind.
